message.body: Hi! How are you?
Hi I am good. How are you?
I'm fine. Trying to stay cool. Are you in philadelphia?
Yeah I am in Philadelphia. It is definitely hot today.
Have you been doing this text message study for a while? I just started a few days ago.
For about a week.
Have you been able to text a lot everyday? On some days i got no responses all day. I guess the people weren't available.
I have had a chat setup everyday so far, but not everyone responds or I am unable to respond.
Ok yeah that's what happened to me. Do you have plans for the weekend?
Somewhat, I have a benefit to attend for my friend tomorrow. I am not really sure about tonight. What about you?
I'm going to a graduation tonight and i'm selling at a flea market tomorrow.
Cool. What will you sell at the flea market?
What's the benefit for? What's the cause?
My friend was diagnosed with Hodgkin's Lymphoma.
Mostly clothes and household items but also snacks, cold water and mary kay products.
I'm sorry to hear that. What is it?
Is he raising money for a certain treatment that he needs?
It's a form of cancer of the lymph nodes. It affects the white blood cells and spreads throughout the body. It is one of the most treatable forms of canc
er even in advanced stages.
Or is he raising money to support research?
Yeah he is raising money for the chemotherapy and other medical expenses. He has no health insurance.
That's awesome! I'm glad it can be treated. I had family members with cancer that wasn't able to be treated which was unfortunate.
Oh wow. It's rough to have an illness like that without insurance. You're forced to pay high medical bills.
Yeah especially being young I was glad he has options. I am sorry to hear that about your family.
Yeah I think the cost is somewhere around $250, 000
I hope the benefit goes well.
Will it be a dinner or show? What will he be doing?
Yeah I think it will. Same for your flea market.
I think there will be food and drinks, live music and an auction.
Oh my goodness! That's outrageous. Who can afford services like that?
Thanks. :)
I am really not sure how this is all being paid for. I think a lor of the auction items were donated
How much time has he been preparing for it? Sounds like it will be really nice.
How much is the admission?
It should be a good time. I think it has been in preparation for about 3 months.
What kinds of items are being auctioned?
I think some art work, sports memorabilia and gift cards
That's so exciting. It's finally here!
I love it. Very cool prizes!
Oh yeah...it is $35 for admission
Yeah it should be a good time
I'm getting a lot of repeats of your text messages. I get about two or three copies of each one.
Oh really it is only happening occasionally on my end.
Hmmm. Interesting. Maybe there's something wrong with the connection.
Yeah it is strange
The graduation is about to start. Talk to you later ok?
Ok sounds good.
